Meet The Team

Meet our dedicated team at Abbington House – a group of compassionate professionals committed to helping you or your loved one reclaim life from addiction.
Greg Georghiou
Founder
Open Profile
Michael Williams
Treatment Manager
Open Profile

Manager

It is the responsibility of our team to care for and nurture you during your treatment at Abbington House, and we take great pride in the work that we do in changing lives. Throughout your stay, you will get to know us as we walk this journey together.
